ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: A departamental requirement that can feel like one.
I would recommend SPAN 500 to another student because it provides excellent context for the literary works we study and serves as a good general review of Spanish history.

Great course for anyone wanting to understand the history of the Spanish language. Professor Poole is a very knowledgeable instructor who is very interested in helping students think critically and learn. I definitely recommend this course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The syllabus seemed promising, but I did not think I gained much lasting knowledge apart from my notes.

This course encouraged me to think more carefully about the language which provides the foundation for the literary works we study. It has helped me to consider the way in which linguistic developments impact literary expression and to further examine the relationship among language, politics, and literature.
This course is critical to my development as a hispanist. Knowledge of how the Spanish language developed will undoubtedly serve me in my dissertation and future research.
It prepares you well for the doctoral exams.
